metadata.name: Tony Milton - Jungle Steps
metadata.description:
Part of the Hypothalamus Records series.

This is a faux vinyl album cover resembling the graphic style of music covers in middle of last century. 

It features a musician with a hippopotamus head and some typography work which implies which genre the album is about.

It also features the logo: Hypothalamus Records, which represents a faux record company.

It was digitally done from scratch. The aspect ratio is 1:1
